abstract: JPMorgan Chase is suing a former financial adviser who defected to Morgan Stanley Smith Barney and has already transferred $30 million of client assets to his new company, Reuters reported.
snippet: JPMorgan Chase is suing a former financial adviser who defected to Morgan Stanley Smith Barney and has already transferred $30 million of client assets to his new company, Reuters reported.
lead_paragraph: JPMorgan Chase is suing a former financial adviser who defected to Morgan Stanley Smith Barney and has already transferred $30 million of client assets to his new company, Reuters reported, citing documents filed in the New York Supreme Court on Wednesday.
